Sentencas: Glass and glass ceramic are now well known for their high performances as sealants operating around 800 A degrees C in solid oxide electrolyser cell.
Titulo: Development and characterisation of glass and glass ceramic sealants for solid oxide electrolyser cells

Sentencas: Several new formulations have been prepared and investigated: silica alkali borosilicate glass formulations that will create a glass sealant and calcium aluminosilicate formulations that will create a glass ceramic sealant.
Titulo: Development and characterisation of glass and glass ceramic sealants for solid oxide electrolyser cells

Sentencas: Thermal and physicochemical properties of several glasses and glass ceramics along with the crystallisation behaviour were investigated.
Titulo: Development and characterisation of glass and glass ceramic sealants for solid oxide electrolyser cells

Sentencas: The glass transition temperatures (T (g)) of the prepared glasses were found to be within the range of 600-730 A degrees C. Shrinkage, sintering, softening, deformation and crystallisation temperatures of the parent glasses have been measured by hot stage microscopy.
Titulo: Development and characterisation of glass and glass ceramic sealants for solid oxide electrolyser cells

Sentencas: Microstructure and chemical composition of crystalline phases have been investigated using microprobe analysis.
Titulo: Development and characterisation of glass and glass ceramic sealants for solid oxide electrolyser cells

Sentencas: Bonding characteristics as well as chemical interactions of the parent glasses with yttria-stabilised zirconia (YSZA (R)) electrolyte and high chromium steel-based interconnect (CroferA (R)) have also been studied.
Titulo: Development and characterisation of glass and glass ceramic sealants for solid oxide electrolyser cells
